mapper.delete: delete from t_browsing_history as bh inner t_article as art on bh.id = art.id where user_id=#{userId}
delete from t_browsing_history as bh inner t_video as video on bh.id = video.id where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select `art`.`id`,`art`.`title` from `t_article` as `art` inner join `t_browsing_history` as `bh` on `art`.`id`=`bh`.`id` where user_id = #{userId}
select `v`.`id`,`v`.`title` from `t_video` as `v` inner join `t_browsing_history` as `bh` on `v`.`id`=`bh`.`id` where user_id = #{userId}
